fronttext: I discovered programming and design 5 years ago, everything started as a hobby, making mods for video games. I enjoyed modeling, making pixelart and 2D textures, I spent my time learning new languages, searching for code and helping other programmers. I ended up discovering web programming, which mixes what I like most, the logic of programming and the style in design.

porfolio.mateweb: A personal project, which was to offer my services on the internet, at that time only wise JavaScript, HTML and CSS.
porfolio.sinnel: It was a local computer repair, needed a page to have more visibility and increase the flow of customers.
porfolio.soyhenry: The final project of the SoyHenry bootcamp, an e-commerce selling pc components, with MercadoPago, MetaMask and Auth0 APIs.

aboutme.title: About me
aboutme.description: I live in Argentina, I am 25 years old, I am a calm and patient person, I like football, video games, exercise that in addition to improving health I use therapeutically, beaches, 2D/3D design, taekwondo and what before considered a hobbie, today is my source of income, programming.

extra.description2: I want to continue expanding my knowledge into other technologies in the future, I have scraped the surface of some such as PHP, C# and C++. In the future I am intrigued to see that I can learn from those languages.
